rdf:about="https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=ED-3D;b5e6a609.1502">   <title>Colour and Space in Cultural Heritage | Publication opportunities </title>   <link>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=ED-3D;b5e6a609.1502</link>   <description> Contributions are invited for immediate and future peer-reviewed publication by Colour and Space in Cultural Heritage, www.cosch.info<br><br>COSCH is an interdisciplinary European network of experts in and users of the latest optical measuring techniques and imaging used in recording, examination and visualisation of artefacts. COSCH aims to enhance the existing practice and standards in 3D documentation, by promoting a better understanding of science, widening access and use of specialist technologies. [...]    </description>   <dc:date>2015-02-28T13:42:41+00:00</dc:date>   <dc:creator>Bentkowska-Kafel, Anna</dc:creator>   <dc:identifier>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=ED-3D;b5e6a609.1502</dc:identifier> </item>  <item rdf:about="https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=ED-3D;90a1506e.1502">   <title>EuroVA CFP </title>   <link>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=ED-3D;90a1506e.1502</link>   <description> We welcome submissions to EuroVA 2015, taking place in Cagliari, Sardinia May 25-26, 2015. Submission deadline is Wednesday February 18th 2015. Submit your paper through PrecisionConference&lt;https://precisionconference.com/~vgtc/&gt;.<br><br>EuroVA 2015 (www.eurova.org&lt;http://eurova.org/&gt;) is the sixth international Eurovis workshop on visual analytics held in Europe and continues the successes of the previous editions, held in Bordeaux, Bergen, Vienna, Leipzig and Swansea. [...]   </description>   <dc:date>2015-02-06T12:20:21+00:00</dc:date>   <dc:creator>Jonathan Roberts</dc:creator>   <dc:identifier>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=ED-3D;90a1506e.1502</dc:identifier> </item>  <item rdf:about="https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=ED-3D;c0106c83.1501">   <title>EuroVA2015 Call for submission </title>   <link>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=ED-3D;c0106c83.1501</link>   <description> We welcome submissions to EuroVA 2015, taking place in Cagliari, Sardinia May 25-26, 2015. Submission deadline is Wednesday February 18th 2015.<br><br>EuroVA 2015 (www.eurova.org&lt;http://eurova.org/&gt;) is the sixth international Eurovis workshop on visual analytics held in Europe and continues the successes of the previous editions, held in Bordeaux, Bergen, Vienna, Leipzig and Swansea. [...]   </description>   <dc:date>2015-01-13T14:13:04+00:00</dc:date>   <dc:creator>Jonathan Roberts</dc:creator>   <dc:identifier>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=ED-3D;c0106c83.1501</dc:identifier> </item>  <item rdf:about="https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=ED-3D;499b359c.1412">   <title>3D webinar </title>   <link>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=ED-3D;499b359c.1412</link>   <description> Dear Colleagues,<br><br>Following the success of our Jisc Digital Media webinar on 3D imaging last Wednesday, we are presenting another this Wednesday, at 12:00, again on 3D imaging. Please find the details on our web site and we look forward to seeing you there.<br><br>http://www.jiscdigitalmedia.ac.uk/surgery/session/delivering-and-using-3d<br><br>Best regards,<br><br>Matt Faber<br>Jisc Digital Media   </description>   <dc:date>2014-12-08T14:17:51+00:00</dc:date>   <dc:creator>Matt Faber</dc:creator>   <dc:identifier>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=ED-3D;499b359c.1412</dc:identifier> </item>  <item rdf:about="https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=ED-3D;962c2e60.1411">   <title>COSCH Session at CAA 2015 Siena | Call for Papers </title>   <link>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=ED-3D;962c2e60.1411</link>   <description> Colour and Space in Cultural Heritage: Interdisciplinary Connections<br><br>COSCH session at the CAA 2015 Conference in Siena<br><br>30 March-3 April 2015<br><br>http://caaconference.org/program/sessions/6d/<br><br>The COST Action 'Colour and Space in Cultural Heritage' invites papers and posters addressing key interdisciplinary questions - scientific and technological, theoretical and practical - concerning the development and use of optical measuring techniques and electronic imaging, applied to documentation and presentation of artefacts. The Digital Humanities [...]    </description>   <dc:date>2014-11-13T03:37:08+00:00</dc:date>   <dc:creator>Bentkowska-Kafel, Anna</dc:creator>   <dc:identifier>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=ED-3D;962c2e60.1411</dc:identifier> </item>  <item rdf:about="https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=ED-3D;968c46bd.1411">   <title>Re: 3D technologies in FE and HE </title>   <link>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=ED-3D;968c46bd.1411</link>   <description> Hi Nigel,<br><br>That's really helpful.<br><br>Thanks,<br><br>Matt<br><br>Matt Faber<br>Advisor - Image Digitisation<br>P 0203 697 5872<br>E m.faber@jisc.ac.uk<br>S mattfaberjisc<br>T www.twitter.com/jiscdigital<br>One Castlepark, Tower Hill, Bristol, BS2 0JA<br>jisc.ac.uk<br>Jisc is a registered charity (number 1149740) and a company limited by guarantee which is registered in England under Company No. 5747339, VAT No. GB 882 5529 90. Jisc's registered office is: One Castlepark, Tower Hill, Bristol, BS2 0JA. T 0203 697 5800. jisc.ac.uk [...]    </description>   <dc:date>2014-11-06T15:00:35+00:00</dc:date>   <dc:creator>Matt Faber</dc:creator>   <dc:identifier>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=ED-3D;968c46bd.1411</dc:identifier> </item>  <item rdf:about="https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=ED-3D;440c4ce2.1411">   <title>Re: 3D technologies in FE and HE </title>   <link>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=ED-3D;440c4ce2.1411</link>   <description> Hi Jane<br><br>That's really helpful.<br><br>Thanks,<br><br>Matt<br><br>Matt Faber<br>Advisor - Image Digitisation<br>P 0203 697 5872<br>E m.faber@jisc.ac.uk<br>S mattfaberjisc<br>T www.twitter.com/jiscdigital<br>One Castlepark, Tower Hill, Bristol, BS2 0JA<br>jisc.ac.uk<br>Jisc is a registered charity (number 1149740) and a company limited by guarantee which is registered in England under Company No. 5747339, VAT No. GB 882 5529 90. Jisc's registered office is: One Castlepark, Tower Hill, Bristol, BS2 0JA. T 0203 697 5800. jisc.ac.uk [...]    </description>   <dc:date>2014-11-06T15:00:10+00:00</dc:date>   <dc:creator>Matt Faber</dc:creator>   <dc:identifier>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=ED-3D;440c4ce2.1411</dc:identifier> </item>  <item rdf:about="https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=ED-3D;70dc14d1.1411">   <title>Re: 3D technologies in FE and HE </title>   <link>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=ED-3D;70dc14d1.1411</link>   <description> Hi Mat<br><br>we teach 3D drawing &amp; Printing on the BA Hons 3D Desing Craft, and bits of the Fine Art BA at Havering College (London UK)<br><br>all the best<br><br>Jane<br><br>Dr Jane Norris<br>Programme Leader<br>BA (Hons) 3D Design Craft<br><br>Havering College<br>Ardleigh Green rd<br>Romford<br>Essex<br>RM11 2LL<br><br>jane@viatopia.plus.com<br><br>On 5 Nov 2014, at 16:00, Matt Faber &lt;m.faber@JISC.AC.UK&gt; wrote:<br><br>&gt; Hello,<br>&gt;<br>> I'm trying to find out how many FE and HE courses, in the UK, offer 3D imaging as part of their syllabus. This could be digital arts, archaeology or computer sciences etc. Any help would [...]    </description>   <dc:date>2014-11-05T18:31:27+00:00</dc:date>   <dc:creator>Jane Norris</dc:creator>   <dc:identifier>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=ED-3D;70dc14d1.1411</dc:identifier> </item>  <item rdf:about="https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=ED-3D;25dba586.1411">   <title>Re: 3D technologies in FE and HE </title>   <link>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=ED-3D;25dba586.1411</link>   <description> Hi Matt,<br><br>I cover 3D computer graphics techniques and visualization in my final<br>year undergraduate module on our computer science BSc.<br><br>Best Regards,<br><br>Nigel    </description>   <dc:date>2014-11-05T18:22:30+00:00</dc:date>   <dc:creator>Nigel W. John</dc:creator>   <dc:identifier>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=ED-3D;25dba586.1411</dc:identifier> </item>  <item rdf:about="https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=ED-3D;5b78a46b.1411">   <title>3D technologies in FE and HE </title>   <link>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=ED-3D;5b78a46b.1411</link>   <description> Hello,<br><br>I'm trying to find out how many FE and HE courses, in the UK, offer 3D imaging as part of their syllabus. This could be digital arts, archaeology or computer sciences etc. Any help would be most appreciated.<br><br>Many thanks,<br><br>Matt Faber<br>Jisc Digital Media   </description>   <dc:date>2014-11-05T16:00:22+00:00</dc:date>   <dc:creator>Matt Faber</dc:creator>   <dc:identifier>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=ED-3D;5b78a46b.1411</dc:identifier> </item>  <item rdf:about="https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=ED-3D;f16e9914.1409">   <title>FW: Wearable technologies survey - win an iPad Mini </title>   <link>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=ED-3D;f16e9914.1409</link>   <description> -----Original Message-----<br>From: Lee, Mark [mailto:malee@csu.edu.au]<br>Sent: 29 September 2014 13:01<br>To: ED-3D@jiscmail.ac.uk<br>Subject: Wearable technologies survey - win an iPad Mini<br><br>Dear colleagues,<br><br>(Please accept my apologies for cross posting...)<br><br>I am posting the message below on behalf my colleague, Dr Matt Bower. Please direct any questions pertaining to the study to Dr Bower.<br><br>Kind regards,<br><br>Mark J. W. Lee<br>Charles Sturt University [...]    </description>   <dc:date>2014-09-29T14:41:58+00:00</dc:date>   <dc:creator>England, David</dc:creator>   <dc:identifier>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=ED-3D;f16e9914.1409</dc:identifier> </item>  <item rdf:about="https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=ED-3D;fe05f6a8.1405">   <title>Extended CfP | CHArt conference @ King's College London Arts & Humanties Festival, 18th Oct 2014 </title>   <link>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=ED-3D;fe05f6a8.1405</link>   <description> *** CALL FOR PAPERS AND DEMONSTRATIONS ***<br>Extended deadline: Friday, 30 May 2014<br><br>Conformity, Process and Deviation: Digital Arts as ‘Outsider’<br><br>CHArt 2014 conference, part of the UNDERGROUND<br>Arts &amp; Humanities Festival, King’s College London, Strand<br>Saturday, 18 October 2014<br><br>Digital engagement with art is thriving. Much of it is actively subversive of the traditional frameworks that enable art to be created and responded to \ufffd\ufffd\ufffd whether casually or professionally. This subversion takes various forms, including notions of value, uniqueness, fixity and location. The CHArt 2014 Conference wishes to explore the role of digital technologies in the underground creation, display, [...]    </description>   <dc:date>2014-05-24T20:00:09+00:00</dc:date>   <dc:creator>Bentkowska-Kafel, Anna</dc:creator>   <dc:identifier>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=ED-3D;fe05f6a8.1405</dc:identifier> </item>  <item rdf:about="https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=ED-3D;bd575b1d.1405">   <title>CfP | CHArt conference @ King's College London Arts & Humanties Festival, 18th Oct 2014 </title>   <link>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=ED-3D;bd575b1d.1405</link>   <description> *** CALL FOR PAPERS AND DEMONSTRATIONS ***<br>Deadline: Wednesday, 21 May 2014<br><br>Conformity, Process and Deviation: Digital Arts as ‘Outsider’<br><br>CHArt 2014 conference, part of the UNDERGROUND<br>Arts &amp; Humanities Festival, King’s College London, Strand<br>Saturday, 18 October 2014<br><br>Digital engagement with art is thriving. Much of it is actively subversive of the traditional frameworks that enable art to be created and responded to \ufffd\ufffd\ufffd whether casually or professionally. This subversion takes various forms, including notions of value, uniqueness, fixity and location. The CHArt 2014 Conference wishes to explore the role of digital technologies in the underground creation, display, consumption [...]    </description>   <dc:date>2014-05-02T10:29:56+00:00</dc:date>   <dc:creator>Bentkowska-Kafel, Anna</dc:creator>   <dc:identifier>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=ED-3D;bd575b1d.1405</dc:identifier> </item>  <item rdf:about="https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=ED-3D;71e03b0.1404">   <title>Call for Entries - Digital Technology Showcase </title>   <link>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=ED-3D;71e03b0.1404</link>   <description> CALL FOR ENTRIES<br>DIGITAL TECHNOLOGY SHOWCASE<br>UNIVERSITY MUSEUMS GROUP (UMG) ANNUAL CONFERENCE<br>DIGITAL DIMENSIONS<br>12-13 June 2014<br>Wickham Theatre, University of Bristol, Bristol<br><br>University Museums Group (UMG) is looking to showcase innovative digital projects produced through collaborations between museums and universities at its annual conference, Digital Dimensions (http://universitymuseumsgroup.org/events/featured/)<br><br>Have you been involved in a digital project in which university and museum professionals have worked together to: [...]   </description>   <dc:date>2014-04-02T11:20:37+01:00</dc:date>   <dc:creator>Tonya Nelson</dc:creator>   <dc:identifier>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=ED-3D;71e03b0.1404</dc:identifier> </item>   </rdf:RDF>
